page.title: 20People of Bourtie
page.content: Newcomers to Bourtie often remark that it takes ages to be accepted into the community - that everyone seems self-reliant. From the Bourtie point of view, may newcomers come to this area to take advantage of earth's natural resources; not to put much back into the land. Many new families choose Bourtie because of its rolling vistas, unimpeded views of Bennachie and accessibility to Aberdeen. Because of their involvement in North Sea Oil, many stay a couple of years and thn leae. Bourtie people are orn, work and die here. Television plays a part in influencing lives; in a world dominated by business an acquisiton, it can be seen as portraying fact; in Bourtie it is seen as portraying fiction. Bourtie's real world consists of the primeaval elements: air, fire, water earth.
